title: Pinata
description:
A colorful decorated container that comes in many shapes, a piñata is filled with candy or toys. Hit to break open for celebrations such as Cinco de Mayo, this is generally associated with Mexico.

Displayed as a donkey on some platforms, and as a three-dimensional star with 6–9 points on others.
apple_vendor_description: This vibrant pi침ata emoji on Apple devices is a burst of festive color, designed with a cheerful, slightly irregular shape and a glossy finish that hints at its paper-m칙ch칠 construction. Apple's characteristic realistic lighting makes the bright streamers and the suspended form pop with playful energy. It perfectly symbolizes celebration, parties, and the joy of anticipation, often used to add a touch of fun and excitement to digital conversations.
